description: The current name is considered racist but Berlin authorities are now set to pull the new name too.
title: Mohrenstrasse: Berlin farce over renaming of 'racist' station
title_page: Mohrenstrasse: Berlin farce over renaming of 'racist' station - BBC News
maintext: In an apparent u-turn on renaming the U-Bahn station Glinkastrasse, Berlin's BVG said it was just one possible option and it was open to discussion. No signs had been switched yet, and there was still plenty of time before new timetables were printed.
